about_the_game:
Saving Diary "is an independent single player storyline card game. A game gift unexpectedly led the female protagonist Hua and her childhood sweetheart Ma Hai into an unknown world. In order to save herself and Hai, Hua embarked on a series of adventures alone in the card world.
Game features:
Pass mode: Each level is a unique card challenge, where players need to use their cards to defeat enemies and unlock the next level. The level design is diverse, ensuring a new experience every time the game is played.
Rich maps and monsters: The game includes multiple map scenes, each with unique monsters and combat environments. Players will embark on adventures in these maps, facing various enemies and challenges.
Diverse Featured Cards: Over 100 types of featured cards, each with unique skills and effects. Players can create their own powerful deck by collecting and upgrading cards.
Strategic combination gameplay: There are various ways to combine cards, and players can flexibly adjust their card strategy according to different combat needs, experiencing unlimited combat possibilities.
Five characters: There are five characters to choose from in the game, each with unique abilities and development paths. Players can choose the character that best suits their style for adventure.
Content details:
Number of levels: Over 70 carefully designed levels, each bringing a different combat experience and challenge.
Map Types: Explore multiple unique map scenes, from deep forests to icy snow capped mountains, with each map featuring unique enemies and treasures.
Card Types: Collect and upgrade over 100 unique cards to create the strongest deck. Card types include attack cards, action cards, equipment cards, blessing cards, etc., to meet different combat needs.
Monster types: Faced with over 40 different monsters, each with unique skills and combat styles, players need to develop different strategies to defeat them.
Character development: Choose one of the five characters to embark on an adventure, each with unique skills and development paths, providing diverse gameplay experiences.
Saving Diary is not only a card game, but also an adventure journey full of strategy and challenges. This game will bring you endless fun and challenges.
Regarding AI generated content:
In order to enhance the visual effects and content diversity of the game, we have used AI generated art materials in some map scenes and monster designs. All AI generated materials have been carefully adjusted and optimized to ensure they are consistent with the overall style of the game.
